title: Module 1: Introduction to omics technologies
text:
Morning lecture

Overview of the omics fields: evolution and trends in omics technologies
Core omics: Genomics, Epigenetics, Transcriptomics, Proteomics, Metabolomics
Recent advances in omics: Single-cell (2012) and Spatial omics (2022)

title: Module 1: Introduction to omics technologies
text:
Afternoon workshop

Introduction to basic pipelines for the analysis of omic data
